item.title: AMSI
item.description: AMSI # This is the Windows AntiMalware Scan Interface. This is basically an interface for scanning file, processes, and more that can then be used by Windows Defender or other antivirus products. Patching AmsiScanBuffer # It might be as easy as patching the AmsiScanBuffer function provided by amsi.dll to return false. The basic process here is: Use LoadLibrary to read amsi.dll from disk into a known variable handle.
